item.title: Just One Slight Smile is Very Alluring
item.description: ThÃ nh phá»‘ Há»“ ChÃ­ Minh, 30/05/2019 Day 01 We were looking for a coffee shop after hours of playing League of Legends. The parental-control-free first year of college gave us more excitement than we have imagined. We stopped by a famous one, The Coffee House. I didnâ€™t even know the name of the street, but wandering around Phu Nhuan in rush hour is not that smart, obviously. Day 05 We came back, just because my friend told me about the endearing girl at the bar.
